name: I Have No Teeth And I Must Eat
name_original: I Have No Teeth And I Must Eat
description:
SUMMARY

This is a four-player competitive split-screen experience.

Mama Kraken is hungry, and there's nothing she likes more than some tasty fishes wrapped in pirate! Too bad these buccaneers ain't got no TEETH with which to masticate their FOOD!!! 

HOW TO PLAY

Collect "teeth" and "food" for your pirate
Beat your squidlings by making your pirate a bigger, better yum for Mama Kraken!

WHY THOUGH?

Made in 48 Hours for Global Game Jam 2023
Theme: Roots
Location: The FuseBox in Brighton
By: Brendan, David, Jeff, Marshall and Nina

Also the MUSIC was borrowed from Grumble Labs @ www.grumblelabs.com

Track: Chaos In The Bubblebath 

POETRY

cephalopod family is here 
the pirates need teeth
for the eating of fish
those clever krakens will prevail

I have no teeth
and I must eat
this is the way
finish your treat

cephalopod cephalopod
cephalopod cephalopod
better than a dowsing rod
put that in your mouth

I have no teeth
and I must eat
this is the way
finish your treat

yo ho ho
and a mouthful of glass
it's fish for your tummy
don't gimme no sass

I have no teeth
and I must eat
this is the way
finish your treat

mama's so hungry
them pirates be plump
just one more fishy
then she'll eat you up
